summary: **King of the Hill** is an American animated TV show that aired from 1997 to 2010. It's about the Hill family living in the made-up city of Arlen, Texas, and their everyday life. The show is funny because it makes light of ordinary things like work, school, and growing up. Creators Mike Judge and Greg Daniels came up with the idea while working on another show. It became very popular and won two Emmy Awards. In 2023, a new season was picked up by Hulu.
title: King of the Hill
